title: Health Ministry still following Keheliya method in medicine procurement: FLSP
byline: The Front Line Socialist Party (FLSP) yesterday alleged that the current government is continuing the old practice of procuring substandard medicines at higher prices.

title: Don’t self-medicate for mosquito borne illnesses, warn experts
byline: In the wake of the rising cases of mosquito-borne illnesses and regular viral fever, health authorities urge the public to visit a doctor if they have fever that lasts more than two days.

title: Elon Musk’s Starbase in Texas will officially become a city
byline: The area where Elon Musk’s SpaceX company operates on the southern tip of Texas is to officially become a city called Starbase.

title: Over 70,000 Police deployed ahead of LG polls tomorrow
byline: More than 70,000 police personnel have been deployed across Sri Lanka to ensure a safe, fair, and orderly voting process during the Local Government (LG) elections scheduled for tomorrow.

title: From peons to Additional Ministry Secretaries will perform duties in tomorrow’s LG polls
byline: A total cadre of 250, 000 government servants ranging from office assistants, clerks and even up to Additional Secretaries of ministries will be deployed to perform various duties pertaining to tomorrow’s Local Government elections to be held countrywide for 339 local bodies, an official said.
